description: Get real-time chart list. Please apply support ticket at first to use view chart.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID to recognize each operation is successful

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Format is [0-9]{10}

parameters.name: acc_id
parameters.description: The basic for PG system, using to identify your permission to the api, need be confirmed with counter party at once

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, acc_id, timestamp. Detailed process check at appendix (Partner Key and RSA Sign)

parameters.name: chart_size
parameters.description: the size of live page. Max=10

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Specifies the starting point of data to return in the current call. Default is 0. If data is more than chart_size, use returned next_cursor_id to start next call.

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if an error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: next_cursor
response_fields.description: If next course has data, this value need set to next request cursor
